data.text: I would that thou, O my kinsman, wert he that sucked the breasts of my mother;
I would take thee, I would bring thee into my motherâ€™s house,
His left hand should be under my head,
I have charged you, ye daughters of Jerusalem,
Who is this that comes up all white,
Set me as a seal upon thy heart,
Much water will not be able to quench love,
Our sister is little, and has no breasts;
If she is a wall, let us build upon her silver bulwarks;
I am a wall, and my breasts are as towers;
Solomon had a vineyard in Baal-hamon;
My vineyard, even mine, is before me;
Thou that dwellest in the gardens,
Away, my kinsman, and be like a doe
